程序包 me.tongfei.progressbar

接口 ProgressBarConsumer

所有超级接口:
Appendable, AutoCloseable, Consumer<String>
所有已知实现类:
ConsoleProgressBarConsumer, DelegatingProgressBarConsumer
public interface ProgressBarConsumer extends Consumer<String>, Appendable, AutoCloseable
A consumer that prints a rendered progress bar.
从以下版本开始:
0.8.0
作者:
Alex Peelman, Tongfei Chen
